items.text: The Fizz strikes first ball angled across the batsman from over the wicket. Full and tempted him into going for the drive, but he couldn't keep it down, ansliced d it went straight to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Ihsanullah, OUT

dismissal.text: Ihsanullah c Najmul Hossain Shanto b Mustafizur Rahman 8 (11b 2x4 0x6) SR: 72.72

items.text: back of a length on off, and defended back
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Rahmat Shah, no run

items.text: full on the stumps and punched to cover. There was a single there, but Shahzad was static and said no.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Rahmat Shah, no run

items.text: angling across him, he punches it from outside off to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Rahmat Shah, no run

items.text: lovely drive, but straight to short cover. Full ball on offstump and he leaned into the drive well, but Mortaza was there to stop it
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Rahmat Shah, no run

items.text: length ball on off, patted back to mid-off. Wicket maiden
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Rahmat Shah, no run

items.text: short ball outside off with a lot of room, but he slaps it straight to cover off the back foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, driven to mid-on
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: lbw appeal turned down. He's caught on the back foot trying to play the flick, but that's hit him on leg stump and is sliding down
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: boom. Short and wide and this time he doesn't let it go. Absolutely plunders this past cover off the back foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball on off stump, pushed down the pitch off the front foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: short of a length at the hips. Gets on top of the bounce and clips it to square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Rahmat Shah, no run

items.text: length ball slanted across the corridor. Left alone
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Rahmat Shah, no run

items.text: length ball just outside off, defended into the covers off the back foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Rahmat Shah, no run

items.text: length outside off, turned into the midwicket region off the toe-end
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Rahmat Shah, 1 run

items.text: length ball cutting away from off stump, defended into the covers
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: short of a length on leg stump, dropped to midwicket's right with soft hands
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: length ball at off stump, tapped to mid-on with the angle
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: direct hit at the non-striker's end! Rahmat is diving but it doesn't look good. He's gone! Sensational work from Shakib at point. A dive to his right to stop Shahzad's cut first of all and then, despite not having the ball in his hand, a quick recovery to pick up chuck the stumps down with his throwing arm. There was no run there, more so with Shahzad as his partner. Poor judgement from Rahmat
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, OUT

dismissal.text: Rahmat Shah run out (Shakib Al Hasan) 1 (9b 0x4 0x6) SR: 11.11

items.text: length on middle stump, blocked off the front foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, sliced to point off the back foot
items.postText: joynul: "so, shakib got revenge with a direct hit run out. hope to see this spark into his bowling "
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, clipped through midwicket off the front foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, driven back to the bowler with the turn
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: slashed away. Massive disrespect towards the ball. Short and wide and he doesn't even bother moving his feet as he sends it flying to the backward point boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mohammad Shahzad, FOUR runs
